trans-unit.source: Add admin mixin to corresponding model admin:
trans-unit.target: 在对应的模型管理中加入管理员插件。

trans-unit.source: Add model mixin to your models:
trans-unit.target: 在你的模型中添加模型混合素。

trans-unit.source: Now you have readonly fields with date and author of last revision in admin "edit" page.
trans-unit.target: 现在你在管理 "编辑 "页面有了最后修改的日期和作者的只读字段。

trans-unit.source: Often it is useful to know date and author of object creation or modification. django-admin-blame provides a django model mixin with fields:
trans-unit.target: django-admin-blame提供了一个带有字段的django模型 mixin。

trans-unit.source: Tools for logging changes made from Django admin
trans-unit.target: 用于记录Django管理员的修改的工具。

trans-unit.source: created_by (FK to User) - reference to an admin user who created this object through admin site
trans-unit.target: created_by (FK to User)-引用通过管理员站点创建此对象的管理员用户。

trans-unit.source: django-admin-blame is a Django app providing mixins for tracking date and author of model changes from django admin.
trans-unit.target: django-admin-blame是一个Django应用,它为django管理员提供了跟踪模型修改日期和作者的mixins。

trans-unit.source: modified (datetime) - timestamp of last object modification
trans-unit.target: modified (datetime)-最后一次修改对象的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: modified_by (FK to User) - reference to an admin user who made last changes to this object through admin site. If changes has been made somewhere else, field value is reset to None.
trans-unit.target: modified_by（对用户FK）-指通过管理站点对该对象进行最后更改的管理员用户。如果在其他地方进行了更改，则字段值将重置为 None 。
